description: little girl with dark hair in foreground, head and chest visible, facing camera, with her PL arm raised, holding a small object; blonde woman smoking a cigarette behind her; little boy wearing shorts at L; woman in a dress at far L; on a beach
markings: \'C1981 Joan Moss/c1981 Joan Moss Mothers & Their Children Christine forefront holding sand 1 3/4 m open #3\', in pencil, on back
title: Mothers and Their Children, Cristine Forefront Holding Sand
